template_info.name: Defensive Starter Team
template_info.description: A sturdy defensive team that focuses on outlasting opponents and controlling the battlefield
template_info.usage_notes: This team excels at taking hits, healing, and wearing down opponents over time. Learn patience and defensive positioning.

pokemon.name: snorlax
pokemon.tips: Use Rest + Sleep Talk combo to stay healthy while still attacking

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.strategy: Bulky water-type with healing support for the team
pokemon.tips: Heal Bell cures status for your entire team - use it strategically

pokemon.name: chansey
pokemon.strategy: Ultimate special wall and team healer
pokemon.tips: Seismic Toss does consistent damage regardless of stats - perfect for walls

pokemon.name: cloyster
pokemon.strategy: Extremely high defense wall with utility moves
pokemon.tips: Use Rapid Spin to clear hazards while setting up your own Spikes

pokemon.name: golem
pokemon.strategy: Sturdy rock/ground type with powerful physical moves
pokemon.tips: Counter can surprise physical attackers, and Explosion is a powerful last resort

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.tips: Use Amnesia to boost special defense, then heal with Slack Off
